00031 str_list_t* dfsch_sl_create(){
00032   str_list_t* list = GC_MALLOC(sizeof(str_list_t));
00033   
00034   list->head = NULL;
00035   list->tail = NULL;
00036   list->len = 0;
00037 
00038   return list;
00039 }
00040 
00041 void dfsch_sl_append(str_list_t* list, char* string){
00042   str_li_t* i = GC_MALLOC(sizeof(str_li_t));
00043 
00044   i->str = string;
00045   i->len = strlen(string);
00046   i->next = NULL;
00047 
00048   if (list->head){
00049     list->tail->next = i;
00050     list->tail = i;
00051     list->len = list->len + i->len;
00052   }else{
00053     list->head = list->tail = i;
00054     list->len = i->len;
00055   }
00056 }
00057 void dfsch_sl_nappend(str_list_t* list, char* string, size_t l){
00058   str_li_t* i = GC_MALLOC(sizeof(str_li_t));
00059 
00060   i->str = string;
00061   i->len = l;
00062   i->next = NULL;
00063 
00064   if (list->head){
00065     list->tail->next = i;
00066     list->tail = i;
00067     list->len = list->len + i->len;
00068   }else{
00069     list->head = list->tail = i;
00070     list->len = i->len;
00071   }
00072 }
00073 
00074 void dfsch_sl_printf(str_list_t* sl, char* format, ...){
00075   char* ret;
00076   va_list args;
00077   va_start(args, format);
00078   ret = vsaprintf(format, args);
00079   sl_append(sl, ret);
00080   va_end(args);
00081 }
00082 
00083 char* dfsch_sl_value(str_list_t* list){
00084   char *buf = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(list->len+1);
00085   str_li_t *i = list->head;
00086   char *ptr = buf;
00087 
00088   while (i){
00089     memcpy(ptr, i->str, i->len);
00090     ptr += i->len;
00091     i = i->next;
00092   }
00093   
00094   *ptr = '\0';
00095 
00096   return buf;
00097 }
00098 dfsch_strbuf_t* dfsch_sl_value_strbuf(str_list_t* list){
00099   dfsch_strbuf_t *buf = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(sizeof(dfsch_strbuf_t) + 
00100                                          list->len + 1);
00101   str_li_t *i = list->head;
00102   char *ptr;
00103 
00104   buf->ptr = buf + sizeof(dfsch_strbuf_t);
00105   buf->len = list->len;
00106   ptr = buf->ptr;
00107 
00108   while (i){
00109     memcpy(ptr, i->str, i->len);
00110     ptr += i->len;
00111     i = i->next;
00112   }
00113   
00114   *ptr = '\0';
00115 
00116   return buf;
00117 }

00119 char* dfsch_stracat(char* a, char* b){
00120   size_t s = strlen(a)+strlen(b)+1;
00121   char* o = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(s);
00122   strncpy(o,a,s);
00123   strncat(o,b,s);
00124   return o;
00125 }
00126 
00127 char* dfsch_strancat(char* a, size_t an, char* b, size_t bn){
00128   char* o = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(an + bn + 1);
00129   memcpy(o, a, an);
00130   memcpy(o + an, b, bn);
00131   o[an+bn] = 0;
00132   return o;
00133 }
00134 
00135 char* dfsch_stracpy(char* x){
00136   char *b;
00137   size_t s = strlen(x)+1;
00138   b = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(s);
00139   strncpy(b,x,s);
00140   return b;
00141 }
00142 char* dfsch_strancpy(char* x, size_t n){
00143   char *b;
00144   size_t s = n+1;
00145   b = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(s);
00146   strncpy(b,x,s-1);
00147   b[s-1]=0;
00148   return b;
00149 }
00150 char* dfsch_straquote(char *s){
00151   char *b = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(strlen(s)*2+3); // worst case, to lazy to optimize
00152   char *i = b;
00153 
00154   *i='"';
00155   i++;
00156 
00157   while (*s){
00158     switch (*s){
00159     case '"':
00160       i[0]='\\';
00161       i[1]='"';
00162       i+=2;
00163     default:
00164       *i = *s;
00165       ++i;
00166     }
00167     s++;
00168   }
00169 
00170   *i='"';
00171   i[1]=0;
00172 
00173   return b;
00174 
00175 }
00176 
00177 int dfsch_ascii_strcasecmp(char* a, char* b){ 
00178   /*
00179    * XXX: this function HASN'T same API as strcasecmp 
00180    *      - it doesn't distinguish between < and >, only == and !=
00181    */
00182 
00183   while (*a && *b){
00184     if (ASCII_tolower(*a) != ASCII_tolower(*b))
00185       return 1;
00186     a++;
00187     b++;
00188   }
00189   return (*a != *b);
00190 }

00192 static void mutex_finalizer(pthread_mutex_t* mutex, void* cd){
00193   pthread_mutex_destroy(mutex);
00194 }
00195 
00196 pthread_mutex_t* dfsch_create_finalized_mutex(){
00197   pthread_mutex_t* mutex = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(sizeof(pthread_mutex_t));
00198 #ifdef DFSCH_THREADS_FINALIZE
00199   GC_REGISTER_FINALIZER_NO_ORDER(mutex, (GC_finalization_proc)mutex_finalizer,
00200                                  NULL, NULL, NULL);
00201 #endif
00202   pthread_mutex_init(mutex, NULL);
00203   return mutex;
00204 }
00205 static void cvar_finalizer(pthread_cond_t* cvar, void* cd){
00206   pthread_cond_destroy(cvar);
00207 }
00208 
00209 pthread_cond_t* dfsch_create_finalized_cvar(){
00210   pthread_cond_t* cvar = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(sizeof(pthread_cond_t));
00211 #ifdef DFSCH_THREADS_FINALIZE
00212   GC_REGISTER_FINALIZER_NO_ORDER(cvar, (GC_finalization_proc)cvar_finalizer,
00213                                  NULL, NULL, NULL);
00214 #endif
00215   pthread_cond_init(cvar, NULL);
00216   return cvar;
00217 }
00218 
00219 #ifdef PTHREAD_RWLOCK_INITIALIZER
00220 static void rwlock_finalizer(pthread_rwlock_t* lock, void* cd){
00221   pthread_rwlock_destroy(lock);
00222 }
00223 pthread_rwlock_t* dfsch_create_finalized_rwlock(){
00224   pthread_rwlock_t* lock = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(sizeof(pthread_rwlock_t));
00225 #ifdef DFSCH_THREADS_FINALIZE
00226   GC_REGISTER_FINALIZER(lock, (GC_finalization_proc)rwlock_finalizer,
00227                         NULL, NULL, NULL);
00228 #endif
00229   pthread_rwlock_init(lock, NULL);
00230   return lock;
00231 }
00232 #endif
00233 char* dfsch_vsaprintf(char* format, va_list ap){
00234   char* buf = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(128);
00235   int r;
00236   va_list ap2;
00237 
00238   va_copy(ap2, ap);
00239   r=vsnprintf(buf, 128, format, ap2);
00240   va_end(ap2);
00241   if (r<0){
00242     return NULL;
00243   }
00244   if (r>=128){
00245     buf = GC_REALLOC(buf, r+1);
00246 
00247     r = vsnprintf(buf, r+1, format, ap);
00248     if (r<0){
00249       return NULL;
00250     }
00251   }
00252 
00253   return buf;
00254 }
00255 char* dfsch_saprintf(char* format, ...){
00256   char* ret;
00257   va_list args;
00258   va_start(args, format);
00259   ret = vsaprintf(format, args);
00260   va_end(args);
00261   return ret;
00262 }
